languages.text: "У народа дух перехватит, если вы им покажете ручного ксеноса! Сразу бросят свои пожитки да талоны и глазеть пойдут, это я вам гарантирую".

traits.locale_text: "У народа дух перехватит, если вы им покажете ручного ксеноса! Сразу бросят свои пожитки да талоны и глазеть пойдут, это я вам гарантирую".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "The people will be amazed if you show them your tamed xenos! They'll drop everything they're holding — including their tickets — and come to goggle at her, I guarantee it."
languages.original_text: "У народа дух перехватит, если вы им покажете ручного ксеноса! Сразу бросят свои пожитки да талоны и глазеть пойдут, это я вам гарантирую".

traits.locale_text: "The people will be amazed if you show them your tamed xenos! They'll drop everything they're holding — including their tickets — and come to goggle at her, I guarantee it."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The people will be amazed if you show them your tamed xenos! They'll drop everything they're holding — including their tickets — and come to goggle at her, I guarantee it."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The people will be amazed if you show them your tamed xenos! They'll drop everything they're holding — including their tickets — and come to goggle at her, I guarantee it."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The people will be amazed if you show them your tamed xenos! They'll drop everything they're holding — including their tickets — and come to goggle at her, I guarantee it."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “如果能让那些人看看被你驯服的异形，他们一定会啧啧称奇！我敢保证，那些人为了看她，肯定会放下手中的一切，甚至连叫号票都会顾不上了！”
languages.original_text: "The people will be amazed if you show them your tamed xenos! They'll drop everything they're holding — including their tickets — and come to goggle at her, I guarantee it."

traits.locale_text: “如果能让那些人看看被你驯服的异形，他们一定会啧啧称奇！我敢保证，那些人为了看她，肯定会放下手中的一切，甚至连叫号票都会顾不上了！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡La gente se quedará pasmada si les enseña su xenos domesticada! Soltarán todo lo que tengan en las manos, números incluidos, para ir a verla, se lo garantizo».
languages.original_text: "The people will be amazed if you show them your tamed xenos! They'll drop everything they're holding — including their tickets — and come to goggle at her, I guarantee it."

traits.locale_text: «¡La gente se quedará pasmada si les enseña su xenos domesticada! Soltarán todo lo que tengan en las manos, números incluidos, para ir a verla, se lo garantizo».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あんたが異種族を飼ってる姿を見せたら、きっとみんなドン引きするでしょうね！手に持ってるものは全部足元に落としちゃうかもしれないわ。番号札もね。視線はあいつに釘付けよ。間違いないわ」
languages.original_text: "The people will be amazed if you show them your tamed xenos! They'll drop everything they're holding — including their tickets — and come to goggle at her, I guarantee it."

traits.locale_text: 「あんたが異種族を飼ってる姿を見せたら、きっとみんなドン引きするでしょうね！手に持ってるものは全部足元に落としちゃうかもしれないわ。番号札もね。視線はあいつに釘付けよ。間違いないわ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous feriez sensation en exhibant votre xénos apprivoisée ! Les gens lâcheraient tout sur-le-champ, y compris leurs tickets, pour le seul plaisir de l'observer de plus près, je vous le garantis. »
languages.original_text: "The people will be amazed if you show them your tamed xenos! They'll drop everything they're holding — including their tickets — and come to goggle at her, I guarantee it."

traits.locale_text: « Vous feriez sensation en exhibant votre xénos apprivoisée ! Les gens lâcheraient tout sur-le-champ, y compris leurs tickets, pour le seul plaisir de l'observer de plus près, je vous le garantis. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Die Leute wären fasziniert, wenn Ihr ihnen Eure gezähmte Xenos zeigt! Sie werden alles stehen und liegen lassen – einschließlich ihrer Wartenummern – und sie anstarren, das garantiere ich."
languages.original_text: "The people will be amazed if you show them your tamed xenos! They'll drop everything they're holding — including their tickets — and come to goggle at her, I guarantee it."

traits.locale_text: "Die Leute wären fasziniert, wenn Ihr ihnen Eure gezähmte Xenos zeigt! Sie werden alles stehen und liegen lassen – einschließlich ihrer Wartenummern – und sie anstarren, das garantiere ich."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "İnsanlara ehlîleştirilmiş bir zenon olduğunu gösterirsen hayrete düşeceklerdir! Seni temin edebilirim ki gelip zenoyu dik dik izlemek için her işlerini bırakırlar, hatta fişlerini bile!"
languages.original_text: "The people will be amazed if you show them your tamed xenos! They'll drop everything they're holding — including their tickets — and come to goggle at her, I guarantee it."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlara ehlîleştirilmiş bir zenon olduğunu gösterirsen hayrete düşeceklerdir! Seni temin edebilirim ki gelip zenoyu dik dik izlemek için her işlerini bırakırlar, hatta fişlerini bile!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
